conbody.p: The workflow for developing a GUI template for customized PDFs is as follows:

ol.li: Create a new DITA template (MFD) in the com.miramo.mmpdf/mmtemplates folder
Publish DITA content using the new MFD file with PDF tooltips enabled [showProperties=Y]
Review the PDF tooltips and decide which format definitions you would like to change
Use MiramoDesigner to modify the format definitions in the MFD template
Repeat steps 2 to 5 until you're happy with the output
Publish to production PDF with tooltips disabled [showProperties=N]
